file title	:  Elevation Data
data type	:	Integer
file type	:	ArcGrid ASCII	
columns	:	36000
rows	:	18000
ref. system	:	lat/long
ref. units	:	deg
unit dist	:	1.00
min. X	:	-180.00
max. X	:	180.00
min. Y	:	-90.00
max. Y	:	90.00
pos'n error	:	unknown
resolution	:	0.01
min. value	:	-405
max. value	:	8685
value units	:	meters
flag value	:	none
flag def'n	:	none
legend cats	:	0
comments	:	Data in the original file represent elevation. In the
comments	:	pgm file, NoData(Ocean etc) is represented as 255, 
comments	:	MinValue as 0, MaxValue as 254, other data are 
comments	:	linearly scaled between 0 and 254
